short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Clicks 'View Report' when Alt+R is pressed.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Adds a new hotkey that lets you run a report server (Microsoft) report by pressing Alt + R.
This makes it easy to run reports that have multiple parameters that aren't filled out to avoid pressing tab over and over again until you arrive at the 'View Report' button.
